column5: This inviting peaceful home is 4000 sq ft, 5 bedrooms, 3 full baths, 2 1/2 baths, gameroom, living, dinning, large large kitchen, courtyard in the back, two large covered porches. It is perfect for entertaining, or hosting family events. Excellent location, nice view, and in the heart of town.   Fishing, hiking, rafting down the Brazos, dinosaur world, or see the dino footprints.
column8: Rent all of Live Oak B&B
